item.description:
v2.0.1

  • feat: export logs for support
  • fix: Corrected launchpad name (Store version only)
  • fix: Panel always shows up at center location
  • fix: 4th tile cannot be readded

v2.0.0

  • feat: Grid layout to place favorites
  • feat: Favorites in different sizes
  • feat: Show panel constantly and even pin it to stay on top
  • feat: Hold ctrl key to open the panel while dragging files

v2.0.0

  • feat: Grid layout to place favorites
  • feat: Favorites in different sizes
  • feat: Show panel constantly and even pin it to stay on top
  • feat: Hold ctrl key to open the panel while dragging files

v1.3.0

  • fix: FileFillet won't start on macOS 13 in some cases

v1.2.0

  • feat: allow to change the tab width (pro)
  • feat: allow to turn off subdirectories popup
  • fix: tab position does not update when external display is attached
  • chore: added more logs to debug customer issues

v1.1.0

  • feat: update of info dialog
  • fix: settings view cannot be opened on macOS 14 Sonoma
  • chore: reduce update check frequency

v1.0.1

  • fix: tab vanishes after open, then close the panel manually

v1.0.0

  • feat: allow to change tab highlight color (pro)
  • feat: allow to change the tab size (pro)
  • feat: allow to change panel opacity (pro)
  • feat: allow to switch between compact panel and full panel (pro)
  • feat: quick access to settings in panel
  • feat: launch at login
  • feat: welcome screen with tutorial videos
  • fix: option key to copy files not detected properly
  • fix: copy icon not shown on panel favorites
  • fix: open favorite directory opens parent with favorite selected

v1.2.0

  • feat: allow to change the tab width (pro)
  • feat: allow to turn off subdirectories popup
  • fix: tab position does not update when external display is attached
  • chore: added more logs to debug customer issues

v1.1.0

  • feat: update of info dialog
  • fix: settings view cannot be opened on macOS 14 Sonoma
  • chore: reduce update check frequency

v1.0.1

  • fix: tab vanishes after open, then close the panel manually

  • feat: allow to change tab highlight color (pro)
  • feat: allow to change the tab size (pro)
  • feat: allow to change panel opacity (pro)
  • feat: allow to switch between compact panel and full panel (pro)
  • feat: quick access to settings in panel
  • feat: launch at login
  • feat: welcome screen with tutorial videos
  • fix: option key to copy files not detected properly
  • fix: copy icon not shown on panel favorites
  • fix: open favorite directory opens parent with favorite selected

  • fix: settings view cannot be opened on macOS 14 Sonoma
  • chore: reduce update check frequency
